title.rendered: 3.7V 600mAH (Lithium Polymer) 3 Pin Connector Lipo Rechargeable Battery Model – P0656 (622632)

content.rendered: 3.7V 600mAH (Lithium Polymer) Lipo Rechargeable Battery also known as Lipo or Lipoly batteries are thin, light and powerful. This battery has a capacity of 600mAH. These Batteries are widely used in GPS, DVD, ipod, Tablet PC, MP4 Player, Power Bank, Mobile Backup Power Supply, Bluetooth Speaker, IOT and other DIY and Industrial applications.

excerpt.rendered:
• Battery Capacity: 600mAh
• Voltage: 3.7V
• Battery Type: Lithium Polymer
• Size : 32x26x6.2 (in mm) :
• Weight : 10gm
• Application: Bluetooth speaker, GPS, Mp4 player, DVD, Power bank, RC Toys, LED’s and other electronic device
